name: LogiCircuit
description:
Create Huge Circuits!

  • Build - Place many logic gates in a voxel world, the only limit is your imagination.
  • Connect - Use connect mode to link logic gates together with non-physical wires. Use various connect tools to speed up the process!
  • Test - Simulate your Circuits by using inputs and outputs, with many features to control the tick speed.
  • Integrated Circuits! - Combine your huge circuits into a custom block with the press of a button.

Cool Upcoming Features

LogiCircuit is unique 3D Circuit Simulator where you can play with your friends in Multiplayer, play in a Tutorial/Campaign mode, and more!
